definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[זוּ]] i.q. [[זׁה]] (q.v.): only Ho 7:16 b [[זוֹ לַעָגׇּם]] this (i.e. the falling by the sword, v:a) is their derision; and (as, relat.) Ps 132:12 [[וְעֵדׂ֫âִתי זׁוֹ]] and my testimony which… (neglecting the accentuation: v. De, and cf. the remark under [[זֶה]]
